snippet: Lydia Ko, a 15-year-old from New Zealand, shot an even-par 72 and was two strokes off the clubhouse lead at Royal Liverpool Golf Club.
abstract: Haeji Kang and So Yeon Ryu share the first-round lead at the Women's British Open; 15-year-old Lydia Ko finishes two strokes behind, along with 16 other golfers.
lead_paragraph: Lydia Ko, a 15-year-old from New Zealand, shot an even-par 72 and was two strokes off the clubhouse lead at Royal Liverpool Golf Club.

headline.seo: Lydia Ko Starts Strong at Women’s British Open, Trailing by 2
headline.main: 15-Year-Old Trails by Two at Women’s British Open
headline.print_headline: 15-Year-Old Trails by Two At Women’s British Open
